thread.title: Selena Gomez cuts stylish figure in blue jumper and baggy jeans as she steps out in Los Angeles
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez cuts stylish figure in blue jumper and baggy jeans as she steps out in Los Angeles

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Selena Gomez cuts stylish figure in blue jumper and baggy jeans as she steps out in Los Angeles
text:
Showbiz Selena Gomez cuts stylish figure in blue jumper and baggy jeans as she steps out in Los Angeles The star looked like she meant business as she was spotted out and about after a coffee run Share Looking good: Selena Gomez (Photo: GC Images)     
Selena Gomez cut a stylish figure as she stepped out in Los Angeles on Thursday. 
The pop star was seen making her way to a car with a coffee in one hand and a cream handbag in the other. 
The singer, 24, looked hot in a pair of flared cut-off jeans and a navy blue jumper adorned with a dinosaur which she wore over a white polo neck. 
She accessorised with a pair of light pink round shades and pale pink pumps. 
Ditching the extensions, she was showing off her natural head of shoulder-length hair which she wore in loose waves. Selena Gomez (Photo: GC Images) Selena Gomez (Photo: GC Images) 
Meanwhile, the previous night Bella Hadid and Sel's current beau The Weeknd both attended a concert at Madison Square Garden. 
The former couple - who split last November after 18 months together - appear to have crossed paths for the first time since the 24-year-old singer was pictured kissing Selena when they both went to the New York venue for a musical tribute in honour of A$AP Yams, who passed away two years ago. Victoria's Secret Fashion Show (Photo: Rex Features) 
The Can't Feel My Face star was one of the performers at the event, along with the likes of Schoolboy Q, Kendrick Lamar, A$AP Rocky and French Montana. 
Meanwhile, Bella was in attendance with her friend Kendall Jenner, who is rumoured to be dating A$AP Rocky. 
While it isn't clear if the former couple spoke at the event or even came face-to-face, they were hanging out with the same people. Selena Gomez arrives at LAX Airport (Photo: Splash News) Selena Gomez arrives at LAX Airport (Photo: Splash News) 
Celebrity jeweller Ben Baller shared a number of clips on Instagram, including one of "his boy" The Weeknd on stage, and another of him dancing with the models. 
It was recently claimed the 20-year-old beauty is "hurt and p***ed" that her former boyfriend - whose real name is Abel Tesfaye - has moved on with Selena. 
A source said: "Bella and Abel's split wasn't dramatic, but of course she's hurt and p****d that he's moved on so quickly with Selena." 
But Selena isn't worried about hurting Bella as they've never been that close. Bella Hadid was spotted arriving at Up and Down Nightclub in NYC for her private birthday bash (Photo: Splash) Bella Hadid And The Weeknd Dine At Madeo Restaurant in West Hollywood (Photo: Splash) 
An insider said previously: "Selena was always the girl who stayed away from a lot of the Taylor Swift crew, except for Taylor. She preferred to be one-on-one with Taylor and didn't like being a part of the whole squad thing." 
And another added: "Selena is not good friends with either Gigi or Bella. She knows them through other people, but they are just acquaintances. She is friendly with them, but not friends with them ... Selena and Gigi were never fond of each other, so Selena definitely doesn't have any stipulations about hooking up with or dating Bella's ex." Like us on Facebook
